content: दर्पः, दर्पण, दर्पित &c. See under दृप्.

दर्पणः [दृप्-ल्बु] {@--1@} A looking-glass, mirror; लोचनाभ्यां विहीनस्य दर्पणः किं करिष्यति <ls>Chāṇ. 109</ls>; <ls>Ku. 7. 26</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 10</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 37.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a mountain inhabited by Kubera. --णं {@--1@} The eye. {@--2@} Kindling, inflaming, making proud.
